The_Art_Gallery_of_AjarnThawan_Duchanee_: The Art Gallery of AjarnThawan Duchanee:  , National Artist in Visual Arts (Painting):  , on the area of over 100 rais consists of over 40 architectural buildings inspired by different designs according to the evolution and the era as follows: ๑) Wood culture group:  , ๒) Pottery culture group:  , ๓) Concrete culture group:  , and ๔) Service house and pavillon group. This tourist attraction is also the destination of those seeking artistic inspiration.
Located_in_the_area_of_Ban_Nang_Lae_Nai_: Located in the area of Ban Nang Lae Nai:  , Nang Lae Nai Waterfall is the water source of villagers for their consumption. If tourists come to the origin of Nang Lae Nai Waterfall:  , they will experience a very beautiful nature.
The_cultural_attraction: The cultural attractions called:  , “Rice Terraces”are the rice fields in the high mountain zone. The hilltribes have to dig up the hillside area to become the rice terraces. Here are so beautiful tourist attractions and there are lots of activities for tourists to learn how to do rice fields as well as to learn the lifestyle of the Lahu and Akha tribes.
Tung_Kieng_Doi_Rest: Tung Kieng Doi Restaurant is located on the field where the children have inherited from their ancestors. During the farming season:  , the grandmother (the teacher named:  ,“Lah”) took her nephew growing in a concrete forest to walk along the ridge. When her nephew saw rice:  , crabs:  , fish:  , and mussels (cherry):  , he was so excited with many questions.        The grandmother thought that this place should be a source of learning and raise awareness for the children of the peasant family to love home:  , to love the career of the ancestors:  , and to love the nature of the field:  ,  so the grandmother built the Hang Na (pavilion) from the bamboo and made a walkway along the ridge. Later:  , visitors have visited and would like to sip coffee in the midst of nature surrounding with fields and mountains:  , so:  , the words:  , “Tung Kieng Doi” happened in this place. Tung Kieng Doi Restaurant & Kieng Doi Café is a small coffee shop to welcome visitors to sit and sip coffee and watch the mountain (Doi) that the real name must be proven.
Strawberry_Garden_Chom_Doi_Homestay_is_a: Strawberry Garden Chom Doi Homestay is another good place to grow good species of strawberries in Chiangrai with the non-toxic growth:  ,  so the taste of them is so sweet and safe. Close to them there are beautiful and colorful marigold flowers to see during the season.
This_learning_source_is_about_how_to_gro: This learning source is about how to grow honey pineapples (Nang Lae) and to taste fresh and smooth pineapples from the garden. The smell is sweet like honey. The taste is so sweet and it is different from general pineapples. They confirm the deliciousness of the registration:  , Geographical Indication that the honey pineapples (Nang Lae) must be planted in Nang Lae Sub-district only.
Doi_Din_Daeng_Pottery_is_one_of_the_best: Doi Din Daeng Pottery is one of the best pottery production sites in Thailand. Welcome all visitors to the hand-made sculpture workshop and exhibitions used raw materials and local labors and designed by Ajarn Somlak Puntiboon.
Five_long_neck_Karen_hilltribe_villages_: Five long neck Karen hilltribe villages are cultural attractions including the long neck Karen tribe:  , the Akha tribe:  , the Yao tribe:  , the Lahu tribe and the Kra Yor tribe living in the village. In the village:  , there is an exhibit of art and culture and here is a source of learning about the way of life of different ethnic groups.

This_restaurant_serves_only_healthy_food: This restaurant serves only healthy foods beacause it uses organic vegetables and it does not put any MSG in every menu. Vegetarian food is served locally. It is also a self - service restaurant.The entrance to the restaurant is in the same way as the entrance of Baandam (Black House) Museum of Ajarn Thawan Duchanee.
The_home_made_pizza_with_thin_crust_in_I: The home - made pizza with thin crust in Italian style by using flour and cheese from the Italian chef. Each pizza is fresh and new. Most of the ingredients are imported from Italy and serve other Italian dishes:  , including pasta:  , baked beans:  , lasagna:  , salads and spaghetti. The shop is next to Bank for Agriculture and Agricultural Cooperatives (Nang Lae Branch) across from the entrance of Baandam (Black House) Museum of Ajarn Thawan Duchanee.
Here_is_a_small_coffee_shop_to_be_decora: Here is a small coffee shop to be decorated with Loft style and offered the quality:  , overpriced to all. This shop is near Bangkok Hospital (Chiangrai Branch) nearby the entrance of Baandam (Black House) Museum of Ajarn Thawan Duchanee.
Pasang_Coffee_Shop_is_the_coffee_shop_th: Pasang Coffee Shop is the coffee shop that brought Nang Lae pineapple:  , which is a famous fruit in the local area to be applied to a new exotic coffee. Indulge in favorite coffee. The shop has a contemporary architectural steel structure.
Phu_Lae_Grilled_Chicken_Shop_provides_pa: Phu Lae Grilled Chicken Shop provides papaya spicy salad:  , yummy grilled chicken together with grilled pork neck:  , fried pork:  , and many local dishes. The shop is located opposite Mae Fah Luang Hospital:  , Chiangrai Province.
